title: SQARR Mini Glass Prep Pinch Bowls, 3.5 inch 4 oz Clear Glass Bowls for Condiments, Small Glass Bowls, and Pinch Bowls (6 Pack)
descriptions:
Elevate your prep and presentation with SQARR Mini Glass Prep Pinch Bowls. These sleek, 3.5-inch clear glass bowls hold 4 oz each and come in a convenient 6-pack—perfect for mise en place, elegant serving, and everyday organization.

Why you’ll love them:
- Versatile uses: Ideal for condiments, spices, chopped ingredients, dips, candy, desserts, and ice cream. Great for portioning and plating.
- Premium, non-porous glass: Won’t absorb odors, flavors, or stains—keeps food tasting fresh and bowls looking crystal clear.
- Kitchen-friendly durability: Stronger and more durable than traditional glass, safe for both hot and cold foods.
- Effortless convenience: Microwave safe for quick heating, dishwasher safe for easy cleanup, and stackable to save space.
- Sleek, simple design: Stylish enough for the table, practical enough for daily prep—fits seamlessly in restaurants, cafes, bakeries, and home kitchens.

From prepping ingredients to serving sauces and sweets, these compact, classy pinch bowls make cooking and entertaining smoother, tidier, and more beautiful. Add the SQARR Mini Glass Prep Pinch Bowls to your kitchen and serve with confidence.
